name: TagsUpdatedEvent
description: Fired on the client when : TagContainer has all of its tags synced from the server to the client (just after a client has connected). The integrated server is about to be created see net.minecraft.client.Minecraft#doLoadLevel Fired on the server when TagContainer has read all tags from disk, during initial load and after the reload command is used This event is fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS On the client, this event fires on the Client Thread. On the server, this event may be fired on the Server Thread, or an async reloader thread.
